title: Using Your UA Scale | Under Armour HealthBox
description:
In this video, learn how to setup and use your UA Scale. 


UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.

asset.title: Using Your UA Scale | Under Armour HealthBox
asset.description:
In this video, learn how to setup and use your UA Scale. 

For more about UA HealthBox, visit: http://undrarmr.co/1RtqEZK

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: With your ua scale you can track your weight, body fat percentage, and progress towards the goal that you set in the ua record. When you step on your ua scale it will automatically recognize you based on your weight recorded in your ua record profile. If you have been able the body fat measurement feature in the UA record app stay on the scale so it can calculate your body fat percentage when you step off the scale it will automatically sync your weight and body fat percentage to ua record. Now you're ready to track your progress with your ua scale.
